area = "citadel2";

dungeon = "MiasmalCitadel";

{
   _root.WarpTrans(["citadel4",29,31]);
}},{name:"NE Portal",model:"o_portal",x:28,y:5,walkable:true},{name:"TRANSPORT_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:28,y:5,triggers:-1,WALKON:true,ExecuteScript:function()
{
   _root.WarpTrans(["citadel3",1,3]);
}},{name:"S Portal",model:"o_portal",x:15,y:32,walkable:true},{name:"TRANSPORT_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:15,y:32,triggers:-1,WALKON:true,ExecuteScript:function()
{
   _root.WarpTrans(["citadel1",10,9]);

if(GameData.CHAPTER == 3 && !GameData.plotVars.CH3TRILOBITES[1][_root.area])
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Trilobite Warrior",model:"trilobite2",x:28,y:33,walkspeed:50,dir:"s",elem:"WATER",conv:"c_ch3sq6"});
}
